column3: 2 Peel-Peel 1 medium onion
1 Peel-Peel 1 garlic clove
5 Remove-Remove the noodles from the package(Break Noodles / Keep them as a block
4 Chop-Chop 1 garlic clove on a cutting board
3 slice-slice 1/4 medium onion into pieces
6 Put-Put all the Vegetables in a microwave-safe bowl
7 Add-Add the noodles to the bowl
8 cover-cover the noodles with water
9 Cover-Cover with a lid (or paper towel) to prevent splattering
10 Microwave-Microwave the ramen for 4 minutes
13 Let-Let the noodles sit for about 1 minute after the microwave stops
11 Add-Add chopped cilantro to the bowl
12 Add-Add chopped basil to the bowl
14 Mix-Mix in the flavour packet to the bowl
15 Stir-Stir noodles with a spoon or fork until the flavouring dissolves
